Devilcat brings the procession to a halt at the top of a low hill, 
which offers an excellent view of ... nothing.  "We're here," he says 
simply.  "Computer, stand down security protocols."  On cue, Rogue 
Star decloaks and lowers its shields, allowing the Rogues and their 
temporary guest to board.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Talos was a tall strong bot. I don't what his beast mode 
> was of late, but I don't think it changed him much.
> 
> He follows Devilcat, not from too far, nor too near.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "We have yet to encounter the Maximals on this planet directly." 
> > Devilcat points out.  Gatara taps him on the shoulder and 
whispers 
> > something to him.  The Rogue commander arches an eyebrow.  "But 
some 
> > of us have seen them in battle, as Gatara tells me.  Perhaps if 
you 
> > could describe this Talos fellow, we could help ..."
> > 
> > He trails off as the Rogue Star's computer alerts him by radio of 
a 
> > comm signal received in his absence.  "Riekan, bring Jayde to the 
> > CR.  Yggdrasil, under the circumstances, I suggest you come with 
us 
> - 
> > we're dangerously close to Predacon territory."
